title: Primary succession begins with bare rock - diagram

content.prompt: Which of the following best identifies and describes the process that is illustrated in the diagram above?

choices.label: Primary succession, because the result is a mature forest with a variety of shade-intolerant shrubs and grasses
Primary succession, because the process in the diagram begins with bare rock.
Secondary succession, because intermediate plant species like grasses and weeds are present
Secondary succession, because the result is a mature forest with a variety of shade-tolerant trees

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe characteristics of an environmental concept, process, or model represented visually.
